Quickstrike:










Quickstrike stood still, wondering where Trantsulas (hope I got it right)was 
going, and mainly how long he was going to be. He couldn't wait long. The 
posion was gone, but his foreclaw was still badly damaged. It wouldn't serve 
him any good. It worked as a leg, which he needed, and it was his second 
defense. Only one worked. One was okay, but he still needed two.

He needed to get back to base, but he wasn't sure if it was safe. Maybe he 
could talk to the computer in some way.

--That wouldn't work. He couldn't communicate to the computer unless he was 
inside the ship. The only way was to travel back to base, and command it 
from there.

It was a plan, but alone wasn't a good idea. He was just one, damaged, and 
no one was there to back him up. He thought of it...again.

He opened contact through Megatron's troops, "Can anyone here me? This is 
Quickstrike, ah need some back-up down here." Telling them his cooridination 
might just cause trouble for him. Hell Beast's troops might come running.
